entry.title: ‘We’re Living Longer, But We’re Living Longer, Sicker’: Rejuve CEO
entry.summary: A SingularityNET spinoff hopes to leverage AI and blockchain to crowdsource better health and longevity.

entry.title: Microsoft Slips Standalone Copilot AI App Into Android Store
entry.summary: As a late Christmas gift to generative AI fans, the Redmond-based tech giant released a free mobile app to rival popular paid options.

entry.title: Barry Silbert Out as Grayscale Chairman While Bitcoin ETF Decision Looms
entry.summary: Silbert will be replaced by Grayscale parent Digital Currency Group’s CFO, Mark Shifke.

entry.title: Solana Cools Slightly as Bitcoin and Ethereum See Prices Slump
entry.summary: Solana, which soared past the $100 mark over the weekend, has cooled slightly. SOL is trading for $109.20—down 11% in the past day.

entry.title: Biggest Crypto Exploits and Hacks of 2023
entry.summary: Hackers made away with a lot of cash in 2023. But not as much as last year.

entry.title: Decrypt's 2023 Project of the Year: Base
entry.summary: Coinbase's Ethereum layer-2 network took crypto by storm, and may have permanently redefined the company in the process.

entry.title: Decrypt's 2023 Story of the Year: The War on Crypto
entry.summary: Regulators really went after the crypto industry this year. But did they go too far? Here's a recap of the battles fought in 2023.

entry.title: Emerge Weirdest News Stories of 2023
entry.summary: From beer made of vaginal yeast to toilets that know more about you than your doctor, these bizarre trends kept us from getting bored this year.

entry.title: Crypto Products of the Year 2023
entry.summary: Web3 gets physical with this selection of Decrypt's favorite crypto products of 2023, from hardware wallets to NFT art frames.

entry.title: NFT Gag Gifts: From Rugrats to Stoner Cats (and Trump Too)
entry.summary: Need a quick, memorable gift? These wacky—and infamous—NFTs are sure to make an impression this holiday season.

entry.title: Socrates Beginner's Guide: The 'Cultural Nexus' Offering Debate-to-Earn Rewards
entry.summary: Social media and entertainment platform Socrates combines elements of GameFi and SocialFi. Here’s how to get started.

entry.title: GG's 2023 Game of the Year: Parallel
entry.summary: The dark sci-fi card game is in closed beta, but already offers stunning character art, deep strategy, and rewarding gameplay.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: New Dog, Old Tricks
entry.summary: As one dog-themed meme coin sets, another rises.

entry.title: SCENE's 2023 Story of the Year: Is the Web3 Dream Dead?
entry.summary: Blockchain tech is more mainstream than ever. But on its path to mass adoption, has Web3 shed its idealist, revolutionary roots?

entry.title: Solana Smashes Past $100 for First Time Since April 2022
entry.summary: Continuing its recent ascent, Solana pushed past the $100 mark Saturday to set a 20-month high, surpassing recent Bitcoin and Ethereum gains.

entry.title: 'Minecraft' Cracked Down on Crypto and NFTs—But Worldcoin Integration Is Fine, Microsoft Says
entry.summary: despite the game's usually prickly stance on blockchain, Worldcoin's new Minecraft integration gets a pass.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Solana Surge, Bitcoin Boom, and Meme Coin Mania
entry.summary: Meme coins are still popular—but new ones are constantly springing up.

entry.title: GG's 2023 Story of the Year: AI Rocks Gaming Industry
entry.summary: Gaming jobs dwindled in 2023 while more and more studios embraced generative AI tools—and gamers hate it. Here's what's on the horizon.

entry.title: Xai Gaming Network Announces Airdrop on Arbitrum—Here's Who's Eligible
entry.summary: Arbitrum's "layer-3" gaming network Xai, built on the Ethereum scaler, will airdrop its token before the end of the year.

entry.title: This Might Be the Last Hurdle for Bitcoin ETF Approval
entry.summary: As the days tick down to the SEC's next Bitcoin ETF deadline, there's one last hurdle to clear: Getting clear on authorized participants.

entry.title: Wildcard's Plans for 2024 with Founders Paul and Katy Bettner
entry.summary: Wildcard developers Paul and Katy Bettner tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about why they see their game as a "Web3 game," not a crypto game, and share why they've stuck with their initial vision despite the challenging broader market.

entry.title: South Korean Game Publisher Wemade Launches $100 Million Blockchain Investment Fund
entry.summary: South Korea's strict anti-blockchain gaming rules have led game studios like Wemade to develop for markets abroad.

entry.title: Solana Cancels Saga Orders After Selling Phones It Didn't Have
entry.summary: Solana Labs apologized for overselling the Saga, which saw surging demand after customers realized the incentives outvalued the phone itself.

entry.title: Insomniac Games Breaks Silence on 'Extremely Distressing' Bitcoin Ransom Hack
entry.summary: Sony PlayStation studio Insomniac Games has finally responded to the devastating Bitcoin ransom attack that leaked game and employee data.

entry.title: Ethereum Pops 4% as Solana Nips at Its Heels
entry.summary: The second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap is up today as developers prepare for the DenCun testnet rollout in January.

entry.title: Amazon Is Giving Away Free Gaming NFTs—Here's How to Claim
entry.summary: UPDATE: Blockchain games like Gods Unchained, Brawlers, Champions Ascension, and Mojo Melee are giving out free stuff via Amazon.

entry.title: Satoshi, Not Satoshi: Craig Wright UK Case Inches Further Forward
entry.summary: The trial was scheduled to begin on January 15, 2024, but the ruling has pushed the start date back at least a year.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Critic Caves as Jack Dorsey-Backed Ocean Mining Pool Flips on Inscriptions
entry.summary: Bitcoin developer Luke Dashjr fought the rise of Ordinals, which he called "spam," but now his mining pool is allowing them.

entry.title: Got a Solana Saga Before They Sold Out? Here Are All the Airdrops You Can Claim
entry.summary: Beyond BONK: Solana Saga owners can now claim multiple token airdrops and other perks, with more in the works.

entry.title: New MidJourney V6 Release Upgrades Visuals and Tackles Text Generation (Mostly)
entry.summary: The new model promises better enhancers, upscalers, prompt following, and text generation capabilities. Stricter censorship, too.

entry.title: 3AC Liquidators Freeze $1.4 Billion From Founders
entry.summary: The freeze stops 3AC co-founders Su Zhu and Kyle Davies, along with Davies’ wife, Kelly Chen, from accessing the funds in question.

entry.title: Decrypt and Rug Radio Merge to Create Global Web3 Publishing Company
entry.summary: Decrypt and Rug Radio have announced their intent to merge, creating the world’s biggest decentralized publishing company. Codenamed [REDACTED], the alliance is aimed at revolutionizing tech-media, bringing together the forces of content creation and consumption.

entry.title: Meme Coin Mania Helps Push Solana DeFi Volume Over Ethereum for First Time
entry.summary: Frenzied trading on meme coins like BONK and Dogwifhat have helped push activity on Solana’s decentralized exchanges to the top

entry.title: Solana Up 12% and Dogwifhat Surges as Bitcoin Dips Under $44K
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum are mostly flat today but, Solana (SOL) and tokens that run on its network continue to rise in price.

entry.title: Animoca Brands CEO: Open Metaverse will Enable DeFi-Style 'Vampiric Attacks' By Web3 Games
entry.summary: Interoperablility between in-game NFTs would enable new titles to create a user acquisition funnel from established games, said Robby Yung.

entry.title: MoonPay Launches Streamlined Checkout Tool for Buying NFTs
entry.summary: The MoonPay Checkout widget enables quick and easy NFT buying with credit and debit cards, along with multi-mint support and more.

entry.title: Claude AI Creator Anthropic to Raise $750 Million in New Funding: Report
entry.summary: The $18.4 billion pre-funding round valuation comes as a fundraising push targets a $750 million raise.

entry.title: Every Game on Ethereum Scaler Immutable in the Epic Games Store
entry.summary: UPDATE: Gods Unchained is back in action after being relisted. Here are the Immutable games that you'll find on the Epic Games Store.

entry.title: Emerge 2023 Company of the Year: Nvidia
entry.summary: From gaming to crypto to the bleeding edge of AI, the chipmaker’s Grace Hopper hardware line will power the future.

entry.summary: The Saga Protocol airdrop is coming. Players can earn a share of SAGA tokens by performing well in crypto game competitions.

entry.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK Dumps $245M in Coinbase, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Shares in Last 30 Days
entry.summary: The profit-taking will continue until prices stop improving—probably.

entry.title: 'If You Play Well, You're Gonna be Rewarded': How FPS Web3War is Bringing 'Skill-to-Earn' to Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Roll1ng Thund3rz co-founder Valentin Cobelea and Zilliqa CEO Matt Dyer joined Decrypt to discuss how the new FPS game Web3War is shaking up the crypto gaming space with a novel "skill to earn" mechanic that rewards players for high-quality gameplay.

entry.title: Creating peaceful money & taking over your local government w/ Joseph Schiarizzi
entry.summary:
This week our host Reza Jafery is joined by Joseph Schiarizzi, founder of OpenDollar and prolific solidity developer.
We discuss: - Onchain beer - Taking over your local government - His Emmy and 3 patents?!?

entry.title: INTERVIEW: Ember Sword CEO Says NFT Games Are More 'Transparent'
entry.summary: Ember Sword CEO Mark Laursen shares why some big game studios "irk" him—and why he got into game development.

entry.title: Director Jordan Bayne on the State of Film3
entry.summary: At the 2023 Film3 Summit, Jordan Bayne—director and founder of The Squad—spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz about how the Film3 world has progressed over the last year and what decentralized technologies can offer to creators that want to buck the Hollywood system.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Phil Mohun
entry.summary:
Bright Moments co-founder Phil Mohun joins 5 Questions With SCENE to recount some favorite moments from the road, including negotiating with Patagonian gauchos, falling in love with Tokyo, and gaining a newfound appreciation for shrooms chocolate bars.
Shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Are NFTs Ever Coming Back?
entry.summary: In this weeks episode we sit down with Cashtro from Arcade.xyz to discuss NFTs, shitcoins, what collections have held onto their floor prices, and more.

entry.title: Web Summit: Will Web3 Gaming Ever be Mainstream?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung, EndeavorXR CEO Amy Peck and Gamee co-founder CEO Bozena Rezab joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves on stage at Web Summit to talk about the future of Web3 gaming.
